channel.title: Oscar's law
channel.description:
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=InmKjGZGx98[/youtube]
Watch the video & sign up below to become an Oscar’s Law Ambassador and help spread the word about puppy farms. The lead-up to Christmas is a critical time for puppy farmers who rely on impulse purchasing at pet shops in order to profit. We can stop the puppy trade by not buying puppies from pet shops and showing others why they should do the same. http://www.oscarslaw.org/​index.php?id=1212

item.title: Oscar's law
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:3, topic:424629”]i want to buy all the dogs in that cannel

to bad i only got 47 €[/quote]
They were in a canal? Looked like a kennel to me, poor things.
